    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:41.320

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:42.320

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

    | text      = Platforming.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:48.320
    | text      = It's great.

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
